availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Cumberland County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Nelly Garman. Father of M. Garman, P. Garman, M. Garman, Adam Garman, Jane Garman, Biddy Garman, Anne Garman, Perlina Garman, C. Garman, Sally E. Garman. Farmer in Cumberland County in 1850. Farmer in Cumberland County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, Cumberland, p. 316A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, District 2, p. 564.
"David Garman (Mar 1804-11 Feb 1873)," Find A Grave, Memorial 13449740, accessed January 16, 2024, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/13449740.
